translations: n．侯爵夫人（复数）：侯爵的妻子或寡妇。
· The marquises attended the royal ball.
侯爵夫人们参加了皇家舞会。

sentences.sentence: Marquises high-speed, Hou railway across the territory adjacent to the Dayun high-speed, the traffic is very convenient.
sentences.translation: 晋侯高速、侯月铁路横穿境内，毗邻大运高速，交通极为便利。

sentences.sentence: When the Emperor Taizong of the Yuan dynasty ascended the throne, he established three Han marquises with fiefs of 10,000 families to govern the Han army.
sentences.translation: 元太宗窝阔台即位伊始即设汉军“三万户”分统汉军，《元史·刘黑马传》又有增立“七万户”的记载。

sentences.sentence: He helpless wry laugh way:"Invited a few dukes and marquises daughters to the Feng instrument a temple today after the mother, I knew, mama empress how can and suddenly Zhao I quondam."
sentences.translation: 他无奈苦笑道：“母后今日邀了几位公侯千金来凤仪宫，我就知道，母后怎么会突然召我过去。”
